MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at  9:06am in the SY15 Abermule and Montgomery and SY16 Newtown postcode areas following reports of a grounded overhead line This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on their way to site and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:15am on 24th December 2020.
